context.title: Overview of DevEpos Search Favorites
context.description: ABAP Search Favorites provide a unified location for Searches that are integrated into the Eclipse Search to store search queries as favorites

context.title: Manage DevEpos Search Favorites
context.description:
Dialog to manage and start search favorites for Eclipse Search.
Hint: Hidden Favorites (unchecked items) will not be shown in the Favorites Drop-Menu in the main Eclipse toolbar and the Search result View
